00017 double GaussianLikelihood::updateCoefficients(double& q, double& r, const double Observation, 
00018                                                                                           const double ModelMean, const double ModelVariance) const
00019 {
00020     // Lehel: Sec. 2.4
00021         double sigX2 = ModelVariance + likelihoodParameter;
00022         double logLik;
00023         r = - 1.0 / sigX2;
00024         q = - r * (Observation - ModelMean);
00025         
00026         logLik = - 0.5 * ( log(2.0 * M_PI * sigX2) + (Observation - ModelMean) * q );
00027         return logLik;
00028 }
